participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and nurturing, with a focus on self-improvement and fitness.
participant_1.background: I want to learn how to manage my finances in a way that will help me reach my goal of becoming a millionaire. he worked hard. I'm not a morning person, but I love playing with my baby's mobile. I'm spending my weekend at home, catching up on my favorite shows and reading a book. i like fitness.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and down-to-earth, with a love for nature and family.
participant_2.background: I am not really concerned with my appearance, as I spend most of my time on the farm. I remember playing with my cat in the backyard all day long. i love living in texas. I start working with my brother in law in Hollywood. i work in a circus as a juggler.

content.text: What is your favorite thing to do in your spare time?
I live on a farm so I love playing with my cat in the backyard. How about you?
I spend most of my time working on my fitness. I have a baby on the way and I want to be a great role model.
That is awesome! My brother-in-law is a juggler in the circus in Hollywood.
You are kidding! How does he juggle all of that?
He says it takes a lot of hard work and dedication. He started out working on a farm too.
I bet! I wish I had the talent to do something like that.
You never know, maybe you could try it!
I might just do that! It sounds like a lot of fun.
I am sure it would be. You should check out my brother-in-law's act sometime!
Definitely! I would love to see that.
You should! He is really good!
I bet he is! He must work really hard at it.
He does! He practices all the time. He is really passionate about it.
That is awesome! It is great to have something you are passionate about.
It sure is! It makes life a lot more fun.
I agree! I am glad you have something you are passionate about.
